definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Shuangta district of Chaoyang city 朝陽市|朝阳市, Liaoning

sentences.english: A large sum of money was spent in building the tower.
sentences.chinese: 建造那座塔花费大量钱财。

sentences.english: Roofless towers appeared and disappeared, thrusting blindly upward.
sentences.chinese: 无顶的塔不断显现又隐匿，盲目的直插云霄。

sentences.english: Throughout their history, the pyramids of Giza have stimulated human imagination.
sentences.chinese: 纵观历史，吉萨金子塔激发了人类的想象。

sentences.english: A prisoner was attempting to escape from a tower.
sentences.chinese: 一个囚犯企图逃离关押他的塔。

sentences.english: I wonder why Tatai bothered to set such a feast for me?
sentences.chinese: 奇怪，塔塔伊为什么要费事给我摆宴席？

sentences.english: Of all the pagodas I've seen, this one has the most beautiful relief carvings.
sentences.chinese: 在我大牛看过的塔里面就属它的砖雕最精美。

sentences.english: Lisa out to explain to the qin guess, hope he put down the prejudice against the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 塔利莎出去向秦猜解释，希望他放下对阿展的偏见。

sentences.english: North entrance to the embedded Taming stone, quite detailed records.
sentences.chinese: 门外北向嵌有塔铭刻石，记载颇详。

sentences.english: The tower was mounted on the backs of "four well-trained elephants.
sentences.chinese: 这个塔搭建在四个训练有素的大象背上。

sentences.english: Who can build the tallest tower with these ingredients?
sentences.chinese: 谁能使用这些工具建出最高的塔？

sentences.english: We made good proposals to Taye but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 我们作了份了不错的提议给塔耶，但是他拒绝了。

sentences.english: An explosion was also reported at a military base in the Tajura region east of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸还报告了在的黎波里以东塔朱拉地区的军事基地。

sentences.english: Albertha, watching from the doorway, cried out and ran to stop him.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔韦塔在门口看到后，呼喊着跑去阻止祖父。

sentences.english: Yes, I want to go to Tokyo Tower, but l, m really lost.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我要去东京塔，可我迷路了。

sentences.english: What else is there? Gosh, there's tons of stuff.  You can go up to Coit Tower.
sentences.chinese: 还有什么？天啊，有这么多东西。你可以去科伊特塔。

definition: one who has mastered the sutras (Buddhism)
